I want to stay at home.
Do you want to stay here?
Do you want to eat here?
Do you want to sleep here?
Do you want to leave tomorrow?
Do you want to stay till tomorrow?
Do you want to pay the bill only tomorrow?
Do you want to go to the disco?
Do you want to go to the cinema?
Do you want to go to a café?
I want to make a call.
I want to send an email.
Is there a sheet of paper and a pen here?
translit: hl hunak waraqat waqalm habr naashfan?

text: Are you already allowed to drive?
Are you already allowed to drink alcohol?
Are you already allowed to travel abroad alone?
translate: ‫هل سمح لك بالسفر بمفردك إلى الخارج؟‬
translit: hl samah lak bialsafr bimufridik 'iilaa alkharj?

text: May one pay by credit card?
May one pay by cheque / check (am.)?
May one only pay in cash?
May I just make a call?
He is not allowed to sleep in the park.
translit: laa yasmah lah bialnuwm fi almuntazih.

text: Why aren’t you eating the cake?
I’m not eating it because I must lose weight.
translate: ‫لا آكلها إذ عليي أن أخفف وزني‬

text: Why aren’t you drinking the beer?
He is not allowed to sleep in the car.
translit: laa yasmah lah bialnuwm fi alsiyarata.

text: He is not allowed to sleep at the train station.
translate: ‫لا يسمح له بالنوم في محطة القطار.‬
translit: la yasmah lah bialnawm fi mahatat alqatara.

text: I’m not drinking it because I have to drive.
translate: ‫لا أشرب البيرة إذ علي متابعة السفر.‬

text: Why aren’t you drinking the coffee?
I’m not drinking it because it is cold.
Why aren’t you drinking the tea?
I’m not drinking it because I don’t have any sugar.
translate: ‫لا أشرب الشاي، إذ لا سكر لدي.‬

text: Why aren’t you eating the soup?
I’m not eating it because I didn’t order it.
Why don’t you eat the meat?
I’m not eating it because I am a vegetarian.
The pictures are on the CD.
The pictures are in the camera.
Can you clean the pants / trousers?
Do you have a match or a lighter?
He is staying in a hotel.
He is staying in a cheap hotel.
He is reading a boring novel.
She is watching an exciting movie.
How did you pass the exam?
How did you find the way?
With whom did you make an appointment?
With whom did you celebrate your birthday?
What did you come to know?
Did you have to call an ambulance?
Did you have to call the doctor?
Did you have to call the police?
Do you have the telephone number? I had it just now.
translate: ‫أبحوزتك رقم الهاتف؟ كان لدي منذ قليل.‬
translit: abihuztak raqm alhatifa? kan laday mundh qalil.

text: Do you have the address? I had it just now.
translit: abihawaztuk aleunwana? kan laday mundh qalil.

text: Do you have the city map? I had it just now.
translate: ‫أبحوزتك مخطط المدينة؟ كان لدي منذ قليل.‬
translit: abihawaztk mukhatat almadiinati? kan laday mundh qalil.

text: Did he come on time? He could not come on time.
translate: ‫هل أتى في الموعد؟ لم يتمكن من القدوم في الوقت المناسب.‬
translit: hl 'ataa fi almawed? lm yatamakan min alqudum fi alwaqt almnasb.

text: Did he find the way? He could not find the way.
translate: ‫هل وجد الطريق؟ لم يتمكن من العثور عليه.‬
translit: hl wajad altariq? lm yatamakan min aleuthur ealayha.

text: Did he understand you? He could not understand me.
translit: hl fahmk? lm yatamakan min fahami.

text: Why could you not come on time?
translit: lma lm tat fi alwaqt almnasb?

text: Why could you not find the way?
Why could you not understand him?
I could not come on time because there were no buses.
translate: ‫لم أتمكن من القدوم، لأن الحافلات لا تسير.‬
translit: lam 'atamakan min alquduwimi, li'ana alhafilat la tasira.

text: I could not find the way because I had no city map.
translate: ‫لم أتمكن من إيجاد الطريق، إذ لم يكن لدي مخطط المدينة.‬
translit: lm 'atamakan min 'iijad altariqi, 'iidh lm yakun laday mukhatat almadinata.

text: I could not understand him because the music was so loud.
translate: ‫لم أتمكن من فهمه، لأن الموسيقى كانت صاخبة بشكل.‬
translit: lam 'atamakan min fahmihi, li'ana almusiqaa kanat sakhibatan bishakla.

text: I had to take a taxi.
I had to buy a city map.
I had to switch off the radio.
I know that – I knew that.
I write that – I wrote that.
I hear that – I heard that.
I’ll get it – I got it.
I’ll bring that – I brought that.
I’ll buy that – I bought that.
I expect that – I expected that.
I’ll explain that – I explained that.
I know that – I knew that.
Which newspaper did you subscribe to?
Why did you become a teacher?
Why did you take a taxi?
We had to water the flowers.
We had to clean the apartment.
We had to wash the dishes.
Did you have to pay the bill?
Did you have to pay an entrance fee?
translit: hl kan ealaykum dafe rusim aldukhula?

text: Did you have to pay a fine?
Who had to go home early?
Who had to take the train?
We did not want to stay long.
We did not want to drink anything.
We did not want to disturb you.
I just wanted to make a call.
I just wanted to call a taxi.
Actually I wanted to drive home.
I thought you wanted to call your wife.
I thought you wanted to call information.
I thought you wanted to order a pizza.
I was talking on the phone all the time.
She took a piece of chocolate.
He was disloyal, but she was loyal.
translate: ‫هو كان غير مخلص، أما هي فكانت مخلصة.‬
translit: hw kan ghyr makhlasin, 'amaa hi fakanat mukhlisatan.

text: He was lazy, but she was hard-working.
translate: ‫هو كان كسولاً، أما هي فكانت مجتهدة.‬
translit: hu kan kswlaan, 'amaa hi fakanat mujtahidata.

text: He was poor, but she was rich.
translate: ‫هو كان فقيراً، أما هي فكانت غنية.‬
translit: hu kan fqyraan, 'amaa hi fakanat ghaniata.

text: He had no money, only debts.
translit: lam yakun ladayh malin, wa'iinama duyuwna.

text: He had no luck, only bad luck.
He had no success, only failure.
He was not satisfied, but dissatisfied.
He was not happy, but sad.
He was not friendly, but unfriendly.
translit: lam yakun zryfaan, wa'iinama thaqil alzala.

text: I didn’t come because I was ill.
She didn’t come because she was tired.
He didn’t come because he wasn’t interested.
translate: ‫لم يأت لأنه لم تكن لديه الرغبة.‬
translit: lam yat li'anah lm takun ladayh alraghbata.

text: We didn’t come because our car is damaged.
translit: lm nat li'ana sayaaratana kanat muetilata.

text: I am wearing a blue dress.
I am wearing a red dress.
I am wearing a green dress.
They didn’t come because they missed the train.
I didn’t come because I was not allowed to.
translit: lam at li'anah lm yusmah li.

text: An old lady lives at the top.
translit: fi alqism alealawii taeish sayidatan eajuz.

text: A fat lady lives at the top.
translit: fy alqism alealawii taeish sayidatan saminata.
fy alqism alsuflii taeish sayidatan faduli.

text: But the neighbours have naughty children.
My son did not want to play with the doll.
translit: lm yuradu abnayi allaeb mae aldamiata.

text: My daughter did not want to play football / soccer (am.).
translit: lm yuradu abnaya allaeb bukrat alqadma.

text: My wife did not want to play chess with me.
translate: ‫لم ترد زوجتي أن تلعب الشطرنج معي.‬
translit: lm tarud zawjati 'an taleab alshatranaj maeya.

text: My children did not want to go for a walk.
They did not want to tidy the room.
They did not want to go to bed.
He was not allowed to eat ice cream.
He was not allowed to eat chocolate.
He was not allowed to eat sweets.
I was allowed to make a wish.
I was allowed to buy myself a dress.
I was allowed to take a chocolate.
Were you allowed to smoke in the airplane?
translit: hl samah lak bialtadkhin fi altayr?

text: Were you allowed to drink beer in the hospital?
translate: ‫هل سمح لك بشرب البيرة في المشفى؟‬
translit: hl samah lak bisharb albirat fi almashfaa؟

text: Were you allowed to take the dog into the hotel?
translate: ‫هل سمح لك بإدخال الكلب إلى الفندق؟‬
translit: hl samah lak bi'iidkhal alkalb 'iilaa alfndq?

text: During the holidays the children were allowed to remain outside late.
translate: ‫خلال العطلة المدرسية سمح لأطفال البقاء في الخارج لفترة طويلة.‬
translit: khlal aleutlat almadrasiat samah li'atfal albaqa' fi alkharij lifatrat tawilat.

text: They were allowed to play in the yard for a long time.
translate: ‫وقد سمح لهم اللعب في صحن الدار.‬
translit: wqad samah lahum allaeb fi sihn aldaar.

text: They were allowed to stay up late.
I don’t know if he loves me.
I don’t know if he’ll come back.
I don’t know if he’ll call me.
I wonder if he thinks about me.
I wonder if he has someone else.
translate: ‫إني أتساءل عما إذا كانت لديه صديقة أخرى.‬

text: Maybe he tells me the truth?
I doubt whether he really likes me.
translate: ‫إني أشك فيما إذا كان يحبني حقاً.‬

text: I doubt whether he’ll write to me.
translate: ‫إني أشك فيما إذا كان سيكتب لي.‬

text: I doubt whether he’ll marry me.
You are so lazy – don’t be so lazy!
translate: ‫أنت كسول بشكل ـــــــ لا تكن كسولاً للغاية!‬
translit: ant kusul bishakl  la takun kswlaan lilaghayata!

text: You sleep for so long – don’t sleep so late!
translate: ‫أنت تنام طويلاً ـــــ لا تنم طويلاً!‬
translit: ant tunam twylaan  la tanm twylaan!

text: You come home so late – don’t come home so late!
translate: ‫إنك تأتي في وقت متأخر ـــــ لا تتأخر بهذا الشكل!‬
translit: 'iinuk tati fi waqt muta'akhir  la tata'akhar bhdha alshakla!

text: You laugh so loudly – don’t laugh so loudly!
translate: ‫إنك تضحك بصوت عالٍ ــــ لا تضحك كذلك!‬
translit: 'iinak tadhak bisawt eal  la tadhak kadhlk!

text: You speak so softly – don’t speak so softly!
translate: ‫إنك تتكلم بصوت منخفض ــــــ لا تتكلم هكذا!‬
translit: 'iinak tatakalam bisawt munkhafid  la tatakalam hakdha!

text: You drink too much – don’t drink so much!
translate: ‫إنك تشرب كثيراً ــــ لا تشرب بهذا القدر!‬
translit: 'iinak tashrub kthyraan  la tashrab bhdha alqadra!

text: You smoke too much – don’t smoke so much!
translate: ‫إنك تدخن كثيراً ــــــ لا تدخن كثيرا!‬

text: You work too much – don’t work so much!
translate: ‫إنك تعمل كثيراً ــــ لا تعمل كثيراً!‬

text: You drive too fast – don’t drive so fast!
Since when is she no longer working?
Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
translate: ‫نعم، لم تعد تعمل منذ أن تزوجت.‬
translit: neim, lm taeud taemal mundh 'an tuzawajat.

text: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
Since they have met each other, they are happy.
Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
translate: ‫منذ أن رزقا بأطفال لا يخرجان إلاّ نادراً.‬
translit: mnadh 'ana rizqana bi'atfal la yukhrijan 'ila nadraan.

text: She watches TV while she irons.
She listens to music while she does her work.
translit: anaha tasmae almusiqaa baynama taktub alwazayfa.

text: I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
translate: ‫لا أفهم شيئاً عندما تكون الموسيقى عالية.‬
translit: laa 'afahum shyyaan eindama takun almusiqaa ealiat.

text: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
translate: ‫سنسافر حول العالم عندما نربح في اليانصيب.‬
translit: snusafir hawl alealam eindama nurbih fi alyansib.

text: We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
translate: ‫سينبدأ بتناول الطعام إن لم يأت قريباً‬
translit: syunbada bitanawul altaeam 'iin lam yat qrybaan

text: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
The train was on time, but too full.
translate: ‫وصل القطار في موعده ولكنه كان مليئاً.‬
translit: wsil alqitar fi maweidah walukunih kan mlyyaan.

text: The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
He’ll take either the bus or the train.
He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
translate: ‫سيأتي إما مساء اليوم أو صباح الغد.‬

text: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
She speaks Spanish as well as English.
She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
translit: eashat fi madrid kama fi lanadana.

text: She knows Spain as well as England.
He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
translit: hi laysat jamilatan faqat, bal wadhakiata.

text: She speaks not only German, but also French.
translit: laittiklum al'almaniat faqat wa'iinama alfaransiat aydaan.

text: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
I like neither opera nor ballet.
The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
translate: كلما أسرعت فل العمل كلما إنتهيت مبكرا.

text: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
translate: كلما أبكرت في القدوم كلما أبكرت في الذهاب.
translit: kulama 'abkarat fi alqudum kulama 'abkart fi aldhahabi.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
translate: ‫كلما تقدم الإنسان بالعمر ، كلما أصبح أكثر رضاً.‬
translit: klama taqadam al'iinsan bialeumr , kulama 'asbah 'akthar rdaan.

text: I’m angry that you drink so much beer.
I’m angry that you come so late.
I think he needs a doctor.
I think he is sleeping now.
We hope that he marries our daughter.
We hope that he has a lot of money.
We hope that he is a millionaire.
I heard that your wife had an accident.
I heard that she is in the hospital.
I heard that your car is completely wrecked.
I’m happy that you are interested.
I’m happy that you want to buy the house.
I’m afraid the last bus has already gone.
translate: ‫أخشى أن تكون آخر حافلة قد مضت.‬
translit: akhashaa 'an takun akhar hafilat qad madata.

text: I’m afraid we will have to take a taxi.
I’m afraid I have no more money.
He fell asleep although the TV was on.
translate: ‫لقد وافاه النوم مع أن التلفاز كان يعمل.‬
translit: lqad wafah alnuwm me 'ana altilfaz kan yaemal.

text: He stayed a while although it was late.
translate: ‫لقد بقي مع أن الوقت كان متأخراً.‬
translit: lqad baqi me 'ana alwaqt kan mtakhraan.

text: He didn’t come although we had made an appointment.
translate: ‫ لم يأت مع أننا كنا على موعد.‬
translit: lam yat mae 'anana kunaa ealaa maweida.

text: The TV was on. Nevertheless, he fell asleep.
It was already late. Nevertheless, he stayed a while.
translit: kaan alwaqt mtakhraan wamae dhlk baqy.

text: We had made an appointment. Nevertheless, he didn’t come.
translate: ‫لقد كنا على موعد ومع ذلك لم يأت.‬
translit: lqad kunaa ealaa maweid wamae dhlk lm yata.

text: Although he has no license, he drives the car.
translate: ‫مع أنه لا يملك رخصة قيادة ، يقود سيارة.‬
translit: me 'anah la yamlik rukhsatan qiadat , yaqud sayaarata.

text: Although the road is slippery, he drives so fast.
translate: ‫مع أن الشارع زلق يقود سيارته بسرعة.‬
translit: me 'ana alshsharie zalaq yaqud sayaratih bisareata.

text: Although he is drunk, he rides his bicycle.
translate: ‫مع أنه في حالة سكر ، يركب الدراجة.‬
translit: me 'anah fi halat sakar , yurakib aldirajata.

text: Despite having no licence / license (am.), he drives the car.
translate: ‫إنه لا يملك رخصة قيادة ومع ذلك يقود سيارة‬
translit: 'iinah la yamlik rukhsatan qiadat wamae dhlk yaqud syart

text: Despite the road being slippery, he drives fast.
translate: ‫الشارع زلق ومع ذلك يقود سيارته بسرعة.‬
translit: alshaarie zalq wamae dhlk yaqud sayaratih bisareata.

text: Despite being drunk, he rides the bike.
Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
translate: ‫لم تجد وظيفة مع أنها أتمّت دراستها.‬
translit: lm tajid wazifatan mae 'anaha atmmt dirasatuha.

text: Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
Although she has no money, she buys a car.
translate: ‫لقد اشترت سيارة مع أنها لا تملك نقوداً.‬
translit: lqad aishtarat sayarat mae 'anaha la tamlik nqwdaan.

text: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
translate: ‫لقد انهت دراستها ومع ذلك لم تجد وظيفة.‬
translit: lqad 'anhat dirasataha wamae dhlk lm tajid wazifata.

text: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: ‫إنها تتألم، ومع ذلك لا تزور الطبيب.‬
translit: 'iinaha tata'alamu, wamae dhlk la tuzawir altabiba.

text: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
translate: ‫لا تملك نقوداً ومع ذلك تشتري سيارة.‬
translit: la tamlik nqwdaan wamae dhlk tashtari sayaarata.

text: Perhaps the weather will get better tomorrow.
I hope that it gets better.
Do you know that for sure?
I think that it is old.
The boss definitely has a girlfriend.
It is very possible that he has a girlfriend.
translate: ‫من المحتمل جداً، أن تكون لديه صديقة.‬
translit: mn almhtml jdaan, 'an takun ladayh sadyqata.

text: I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
I become tired as soon as I have to study.
I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
As soon as I have a moment.
He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
translit: syatasil bialhatif halma tasnah lah alfurasat

text: I’ll work as long as I can.
translit: s'aemal maa dumt qadraan ealaa dhalka.

text: I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
He lies in bed instead of working.
translate: ‫إنه مستلق على السرير بدل أن يعمل.‬

text: She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
He is at the bar instead of going home.
translate: ‫إنه يجلس في الحانة بدل أن يذهب إلى البيت.‬
translit: 'iinah yujlis fi alhanat bdl 'an yadhhab 'iilaa albayt.

text: As far as I know, he lives here.
As far as I know, his wife is ill.
As far as I know, he is unemployed.
translit: hsib eilmi hu eatil ean aleaml.

text: I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫لو لم أغرق في النوم لكنت في الموعد.‬
translit: lw lm 'aghraq fi alnuwm lakunt fi almueid.

text: I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫لو لم تفتني الحافلة لكنت في الموعد.‬
translit: lw lm taftiniy alhafilat lakunt fi almueid.

text: I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
translate: ‫لو لم أضل الطريق لكنت في الموعد.‬
translit: lw lm 'adala altariq lakunt fi almueid.

text: The button from the shirt is gone.
The boss’ computer is not working.
How do I get to her parents’ house?
The house is at the end of the road.
What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
What is the title of the book?
What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?
What are the doctor’s consultation times?
What time is the museum open?

translate: ‫في وقت مضى ـــ أبداً / ليس بعد‬
translit: fy waqt madaa  abdaan / lays bed

text: Have you already been to Berlin?
No, I don’t know anyone here.
a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
No, I won’t stay here much longer.
Would you like to drink something else?
No, I don’t want anything else.
No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.
Does anyone else want a coffee?
I’ll wait until my hair is dry.
I’ll wait until the film is over.
I’ll wait until the traffic light is green.
When do you go on holiday?
Yes, before the summer holidays begin.
Repair the roof before the winter begins.
Wash your hands before you sit at the table.
translate: ‫إغسل يديك قبل أن تجلس إلى الطاولة.‬

text: Close the window before you go out.
Yes, after the class is over.
After he had an accident, he could not work anymore.
translate: ‫بعد أن تعرض لحادث لم يعد قادراً على العمل.‬
translit: beud 'an tuerad lihadith lm yaeud qadraan ealaa aleamal.

text: After he had lost his job, he went to America.
After he went to America, he became rich.
translate: ‫بعد أن سافر إلى أميركا أصبح غنياً.‬
